verbs.description: [V: rolling] [ARG1: the dice] [ARGM-MNR: with enbridge line 5 and the great lakes] [ARGM-TMP: again] neither the state nor line 5 operator enbridge have environmental track records to brag about so why not shut the oil company out of the great lakes kalamazoo enbridge detroit free press rick snyder kalamazoo river michigan straits of mackinac noah hall gretchen whitmer wayne state university law school mackinac bridge authority chairman gov rick snyder bill schuette great lakes environmental law center great lakes
